price: 57. Mpe na lapi na Allah, ete nakani bikeko bia bino osima ya kokende na bino.
arabic: وَتَٱللَّهِ لَأَكِيدَنَّ أَصۡنَٰمَكُم بَعۡدَ أَن تُوَلُّواْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: watal-lahi la-akīdanna aṣnāmakum baʿda an tuwallū mud'birīna
